title: The Writer's Almanac - Monday, November 4, 2019
description: Today is the birthday of poet C. K. Williams (1936), and of Tamim Ansary, who wrote the memoir “West of Kabul, East of New York.”
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: Today is the birthday of poet C. K. Williams (1936), and of Tamim Ansary, who wrote the memoir “West of Kabul, East of New York.”
